attributes.action: Create tougher criminal punishments and build more prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the modern daqy world, criminals are not punished sufficiently. Stop soft scentencing and impose tougher laws for criminals, the government claims there is simply not enough prison places, yet refuse to build more prisons! Make life scentencing mean life!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
